query: ProcessName in contains anycase ("regsvr32.exe", "rundll32.exe") AND SrcProcUser ContainsCIS "NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM" AND UrlAction = "GET"

EventType = "Duplicate Process Handle"  AND TgtProcImagePath ContainsCIS "\winlogon.exe" AND NOT SrcProcImagePath In Contains Anycase ("\system32\smss.exe", "\system32\svchost.exe",  "\system32\csrss.exe", "\WerFault.exe", "c:\Program files", "CreativeCloudSet-Up.exe", "Creative_Cloud_Set-Up.exe", "GoToAssistTools64.exe" ) AND SrcProcImagePath EXISTS AND SrcProcPID != "4"
SrcProcImagePath In Contains Anycase ("rundll32.exe", "regsvr32.exe") AND  CmdLine RegExp "\.\w{3}\"?,#1"
ModulePath ContainsCIS "\version.dll" AND NOT ModulePath ContainsCIS "\windows\system32" AND NOT ModulePath ContainsCIS "\windows\syswow64"
